command.source:
select ca.RAC_ID, PERIOD_ID as INV_QTR, substr(typ.CDSET_VL_DESC_TXT,1,40) as RAC_TYPE_DESC, (case when c.rbat_id>9999999 then trim(char(c.rbat_id)) when c.rbat_id>999999 then '0'||trim(char(c.rbat_id)) when c.rbat_id>99999 then '00'||trim(char(c.rbat_id)) else '000'||trim(char(c.rbat_id)) end), substr(ctyp.CDSET_VL_DESC_TXT,1,40) as REBATE_TYPE_DESC, ra.eff_dt as RAC_EFF_DT, ra.term_dt as RAC_TERM_DT, substr(char(ra.eff_dt,usa),7,4)||substr(char(ra.eff_dt,usa),1,2) as RAC_EFF_MONTH, substr(char(ra.term_dt,usa),7,4)||substr(char(ra.term_dt,usa),1,2) as RAC_TERM_MONTH, substr(char(ra.eff_dt,usa),7,4)||'Q'||trim(char(quarter(ra.eff_dt))) as RAC_EFF_QTR, substr(char(ra.term_dt,usa),7,4)||'Q'||trim(char(quarter(ra.term_dt))) as RAC_TERM_QTR from client_reg.crt_clnt_prc_pool_assc ca join client_reg.crt_clnt c on c.rbat_id = ca.rbat_id join client_reg.crt_clnt_rule_assc ra on ra.rbat_id = c.rbat_id join client_reg.crt_prc_pool p on p.prc_rule_id=ra.prc_rule_id and p.pool_typ_cd=ca.pool_typ_cd join (select CDSET_VL, CDSET_VL_DESC_TXT from client_reg.crt_cdset cd join client_reg.crt_cdset_vl cv on cd.CDSET_ID=cv.CDSET_ID where CDSET_DESC_TXT='DSPN_FCLY_TYPE_CD' ) typ on ca.POOL_TYP_CD = typ.CDSET_VL join (select CDSET_VL, CDSET_VL_DESC_TXT from client_reg.crt_cdset cd join client_reg.crt_cdset_vl cv on cd.CDSET_ID=cv.CDSET_ID where CDSET_DESC_TXT='CLNT_TYP_CD' ) ctyp on c.CLNT_TYP_CD = ctyp.CDSET_VL
,rps.quarter_summary qtr where (qtr.QTR_BEGIN_DT+1 days) between ra.eff_dt and ra.term_dt and RPS_ACTIVE_IND<>'3'
command.target: INSERT INTO rps.t_rac_qtr_base (RAC_ID, INV_QTR, RAC_TYPE_DESC, REBATE_ID, REBATE_TYPE_DESC, RAC_EFF_DT, RAC_TERM_DT, RAC_EFF_MONTH, RAC_TERM_MONTH, RAC_EFF_QTR, RAC_TERM_QTR ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

command.source:
with base ( rac,inv_qtr,RBATE_ID) as (select distinct rac,inv_qtr,RBATE_ID from rps.t_apc_aggr ),
missing ( rac,inv_qtr,REBATE_ID) as (select * from base except (select distinct RAC_ID, INV_QTR,REBATE_ID from rps.t_rac_qtr_base ) ),
line ( rac,inv_qtr,REBATE_ID) as ( select rac_id, max(INV_QTR),REBATE_ID from rps.t_rac_qtr_base where rac_id in (select distinct rac from missing) group by rac_id,REBATE_ID ),
lkp ( RAC_ID, INV_QTR, RAC_TYPE_DESC, REBATE_ID, REBATE_TYPE_DESC, RAC_EFF_DT, RAC_TERM_DT, RAC_EFF_MONTH, RAC_TERM_MONTH, RAC_EFF_QTR, RAC_TERM_QTR ) as (select RAC_ID, b.INV_QTR, RAC_TYPE_DESC, line.REBATE_ID, REBATE_TYPE_DESC, RAC_EFF_DT, RAC_TERM_DT, RAC_EFF_MONTH, RAC_TERM_MONTH, RAC_EFF_QTR, RAC_TERM_QTR from rps.t_rac_qtr_base b join line on b.rac_id=line.rac and b.INV_QTR=line.inv_qtr )
select RAC, missing.INV_QTR, RAC_TYPE_DESC, missing.REBATE_ID, REBATE_TYPE_DESC, RAC_EFF_DT, RAC_TERM_DT, RAC_EFF_MONTH, RAC_TERM_MONTH, RAC_EFF_QTR, RAC_TERM_QTR from missing left outer join lkp on missing.rac=lkp.rac_id
command.target: INSERT INTO rps.t_rac_qtr_base (RAC_ID, INV_QTR, RAC_TYPE_DESC, REBATE_ID, REBATE_TYPE_DESC, RAC_EFF_DT, RAC_TERM_DT, RAC_EFF_MONTH, RAC_TERM_MONTH, RAC_EFF_QTR, RAC_TERM_QTR ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

catch.command:
[ERROR] GDX -> DM REFRESH - rps.t_rac_qtr_base
